Aerial Survey Effort Estimation Example

tidycreel team

2025-08-20

Source: vignettes/effort_aerial.Rmd
effort_aerial.Rmd

Aerial Survey Effort Estimation in tidycreel

This vignette demonstrates aerial effort estimation using a day-PSU survey design with optional visibility and calibration adjustments.

Example Data 

library(tidycreel)
library(dplyr)

# Minimal calendar and day design
calendar <- tibble::tibble(
  date = as.Date(c('2025-08-01','2025-08-02')),
  day_type = c('weekday','weekend'),
  month = c('Aug','Aug'),
  target_sample = c(4,4),
  actual_sample = c(2,2)
)
svy_day <- as_day_svydesign(calendar, day_id = 'date', strata_vars = c('day_type','month'))

# Simulated aerial counts
aerial_counts <- tibble::tibble(
  date = rep(calendar$date, each = 2),
  location = rep(c('A','B'), times = 2),
  count = c(20, 15, 25, 18),
  interval_minutes = 60,
  total_day_minutes = 600,
  visibility = c(0.8, 0.9, 0.75, 0.9),
  calibration = c(1.05, 1.00, 1.10, 1.02)
)

Estimation with Visibility and Calibration Correction 

result <- est_effort.aerial(
  counts = aerial_counts,
  by = c('location'),
  minutes_col = 'interval_minutes',
  total_minutes_col = 'total_day_minutes',
  visibility_col = 'visibility',
  calibration_col = 'calibration',
  day_id = 'date',
  svy = svy_day
)
result

Output Structure

  • estimate: Visibility- and calibration-adjusted effort per group
  • se: Standard error (design-based)
  • ci_low, ci_high: Confidence interval
  • n: Number of counts per stratum
  • method: “aerial”
  • diagnostics: Diagnostics column (future expansion)

Notes

  • Visibility correction adjusts for detection probability (e.g., observer bias, weather).
  • Calibration factors integrate ground truth or reference counts.
  • Stratified expansion allows for aggregation by date, location, and stratum.
  • Variance estimation supports analytic (Taylor) and replicate-weight designs via svrepdesign.

References

  • Pollock, K. H., et al. (1994). “Estimating fishing effort from aerial surveys.” Fisheries Research.
  • Malvestuto, S. P. (1996). “Sampling for creel survey design.” American Fisheries Society.
